creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: open center front; unique shawl collar has 10 separate 1 1/2" squares attached to edges; each has 3 small tassels with beads and different geometric cross stitch; collar front panels, sleeves and back are nearly covered with geometric cross stitch in primarily green and red; appliques and other elements contain multicolors; black and blue lining
dimension: 33 x 48 in. (83.82 x 121.92 cm) (cuff to cuff)
title: Jacket, from a two-piece set
